data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Valdecasas, Antonio G. (2008): Confocal microscopy applied to water mite taxonomy with the description of a new genus of Axonopsinae (Acari, Parasitengona, Hydrachnidia) from Central America. Zootaxa 1820: 41-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.182987
